citations.narrative:
The licensee sold 5 bobcat kittens to a USDA licensed exotic/wild animal B Dealer for regulated purposes. The licensee
does not have the appropriate authorization for exotic and wild felids on his current license. Selling unauthorized animals
does not ensure for the appropriate oversight regarding the welfare of the cats. The licensee must obtain a new license
with the appropriate authorization before conducting regulated activity with exotic and wild felids. Correct from this day
forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee sold 5 bobcat kittens to a USDA licensed exotic/wild animal B Dealer for regulated purposes.  The licensee 
does not have the appropriate authorization for exotic and wild felids on his current license.  Selling unauthorized animals 
does not ensure for the appropriate oversight  regarding the welfare of the cats.  The licensee must obtain a new license 
with the appropriate authorization before conducting regulated activity with exotic and wild felids.  Correct from this day 
forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n
